name: Data Analyst
desc: Logical analysis, structured thinking, and business communication.

name: Software Engineer
desc: Implementation, debugging, and systematic problem solving.

name: Product Manager
desc: Cross-team communication, requirement abstraction, and trade-offs.

name: UX / Interaction Designer
desc: User-centred design, prototyping, and usability testing.

name: Teaching / Training
desc: Clear communication, patience, and structured explanation.

name: Marketing / Sales
desc: Interpersonal influence, persuasion, and goal orientation.
